DOC.brief_summary: Stent implantation best treatment patient acute myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) refer primary angioplasty ( pPCI ) . However occurrence stent restenosis responsible need repeat intervention . Both Sirolimus-eluting stent ( SES ) Paclitaxel-eluting stent ( PES ) proven virtually abolish in-stent restenosis elective patient simple e complex lesion . Both SES PES raise concern regard occurrence late stent thrombosis , especially complex lesion subset high risk patient . The PaclitAxel Sirolimus-Eluting Stent v Bare Metal Stent primary angioplasty ( PASEO ) trial prospective , single-center , randomized trial evaluate benefit SES PES compare BMS implantation patient undergoing primary angioplasty acute STEMI . From 1 October 2003 randomize 1:1:1 ratio , 270 patient STEMI treat pPCI , implantation bare metal stent ( BMS n=90 ) , PES ( n=90 ) SES ( n=90 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Eluting Stent ( DES ) Primary Angioplasty
DOC.criteria: Clinical symptom STEMI , initial onset chest pain within past 12 hour , ECG demonstrate > 0.1 mV STsegment elevation 2 contiguous lead document new left bundlebranch block suitable candidate percutaneous revascularization . Active internal bleeding history bleed diathesis within previous 30 day An history intracranial hemorrhage Intracranial neoplasm Arteriovenous malformation aneurysm Known allergy sirolimus Paclitaxel Heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel An history stroke within 30 day history hemorrhagic stroke History , symptom , finding suggestive aortic dissection , fibrinolytic therapy within 24 hour History thrombocytopenia , pregnancy , patient warfarin acenocoumarol within last seven day Inability obtain informed consent
